Check: "Continue with Google" button is visible and clickable.
"Continue with Facebook" button is visible and clickable.
"Continue with Apple" button is visible and clickable.
Clicking "Continue with Google" opens the Google account selection window.
Clicking "Continue with Facebook" opens the Facebook login window.
Clicking "Continue with Apple" opens the Apple ID login window.
Successful login via Google creates/restores the OLX account.
Successful login via Facebook creates/restores the OLX account.
Successful login via Apple creates/restores the OLX account.
If the user cancels authorization, they return to the OLX login/registration form.
